divs: Sighting DetailsI was lying in my bed onr night looking out of my window when i saw a star moving very quickly on a straight path. I thought it was a satteilite until it suddenly made a 180 degree turn. it started flying around crazily for about 2 minutes until it flew away from the "M" painted on the mountain nearest to my house. It flew toward my house and got larger until it suddenly plummeted downward and then straight up. It then got smaller and disapearred. that was the first time it happened. It has happened around here erratically since then. It was weird knowing that i might be seeing a UFO.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Bozeman

This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: star like ufo moving around in sky
